comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Needs to have PDF figures and captions etc sorted.

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Can't help but notice the model_highd output has a 2d model in it... which isn't really a highd model. Do we need to change this language in the package?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: What would be the utility of this? Can't the parameters of this function include all possible combinations of hexbins?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Just checking - the only use of this is visualisation right? If so we might want to potentially move this to supplementary material and just keep this focussed on the model implementation.

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: I'm really confused about the whole ID and h thing. Here you say a corresponding hexagon ID is h, but then what is ID? Is it ID of the point?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Very unclear at the moment how this is used. Either needs an explanation of the purpose or to be moved next to where it's being used.

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Why is the sorting needed if we're joining by an ID?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Can we pick some rows that don't have w_h = 0 to show the function actually works?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: This is never used again in the whole paper - what is the purpose of the function in the pipeline?

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: I think this one is probably the "Mapping points to centroids" section that the previous section can go under - but I haven't replaced it yet in case I've got it the ordering very wrong from earlier comments.

comments.author: Michael Lydeamore
comments.text: Is this required to be called after gen_edges? If so then IMO it should be baked into gen_edges not left to the user to do.

replies.author: Michael Lydeamore
replies.text: And also I think this will raise implementation questions for reviewers. Why do you require things to be in order later down? Possibly should add a nod to those reasons here.
